title: Language Learning Enhancement Course Using Whiteboard Animation for Large-Scale Audiences

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language skills, adaptability to digital learning environments
context.additional_context: Optimizing language concept acquisition through whiteboard animation with incremental drawing and narrative context in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce visual patterns of language structures with 80% accuracy using the incremental drawing technique of whiteboard animation.
Learners enhance their ability to apply language concepts to real-life situations by 30% compared to pre-assessments using animations with narrative contexts.
Learners evaluate the cognitive and affective effects of animation-based learning modules at over 70% positivity through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
